item.title: Linux File Monitoring With Fanotify
item.description: 1. Introduction Let’s take a break from the GDB exercises and instead look into something that I have yet to talk about in this blog, and that is - Linux file monitoring with the fanotify API. Fanotify is a Linux kernel API that enables applications to receive notifications about file system events.
